prompts.title: 1 Pet - Abstract Art
prompts.description:
Take the DOG from the photographic image, then transform the subject into the style of the last art image, ensuring that the subject's original color remains intact in the artwork.

NOTE: THE COLOR AND EVERY FEATURE OF THE SUBJECT MUST STAY EXACTLY THE SAME. IT'S SUPER IMPORTANT. Ensure that the subject's eyes, ears, nose, facial markings, skin features, and coloring stay exactly the same in the artwork. It's important for better artwork. (IT'S NOT A PNG IMAGE, SO APPLY ALL COLOR ALL OVER THE CANVAS)

-- Make sure that every feature and color of the subject from photographic images is perfectly copied in the artwork, 
-- It's a Contemporary Style artwork, so make it more like it.
-- Make sure that the subject properly integrates into the artwork.
-- Give me options with the new color combos for the background artwork, but ensure that the subject coloring is accurate to the photographic image.

prompts.title: 2 Pet - Abstract Art
prompts.description:
Take the TWO DOGS from the photographic image, then transform the subjects into the style of the last art image, ensuring that the subjects' original colors remain intact in the artwork.

NOTE: THE COLOR AND EVERY FEATURE OF BOTH SUBJECTS MUST STAY EXACTLY THE SAME. IT'S SUPER IMPORTANT. Ensure that the dogs' eyes, ears, noses, facial markings, skin features, and coloring stay exactly the same in the artwork. It's important for better artwork. (IT'S NOT A PNG IMAGE, SO APPLY ALL COLOR ALL OVER THE CANVAS)

-- Make sure that every feature and color of the subjects from photographic images is perfectly copied in the artwork,
-- It's a Contemporary Style artwork, so make it more like it.
-- Make sure that the subjects properly integrate into the artwork.
-- Give me options with the new color combos for the background artwork, but ensure that the subjects' coloring is accurate to the photographic images.

prompts.title: 1 Pet & 1 Human - Abstract Art
prompts.description:
Take the two subjects from the photographic images (a DOG and a HUMAN), then transform the subjects into the style of the last art image, ensuring their original colors remain intact in the artwork.

NOTE: THE COLOR AND EVERY FEATURE OF THE SUBJECTS MUST STAY EXACTLY THE SAME. IT'S SUPER IMPORTANT. Ensure that the subjects' eyes, ears, nose, facial markings, skin features, and coloring stay exactly the same in the artwork. (IT'S NOT A PNG IMAGE, SO APPLY ALL COLOR ALL OVER THE CANVAS)

-- Make sure every feature and color of the subjects from photographic images is perfectly copied in the artwork.
-- It's an Abstract Style artwork, so make it more like it.
-- Ensure that the subjects properly integrate into the artwork.
-- Provide options with the best new background color combinations while keeping the subjects' coloring accurate to the photographic images.

prompts.title: Modern Art Tigger
prompts.description: -- It's a Modern-style artwork, so make it more like it. (By modern style, I mean realistic painting art)

prompts.title: Black & White Art Tigger
prompts.description: -- It's a Black and White style artwork, so make it more like it - monochromatic style.

prompts.title: All Subject's Including Text
prompts.description: MUST NOTE::::  All the subjects from the photographic images must be included in the artwork; each and every subject must maintain its original color and features; the size of the subjects must be exactly the same as in the original image.

prompts.title: Accurate Color & Style
prompts.description: MUST NOTE:::: COPY THE COLOR AND STYLE OF THE PROVIDED REFERENCE ARTWORK TO THE BEST ACCURACY. EVERY BRUSH STROKE AND DEPTH IS MATTERS

prompts.title: Be More White
prompts.description: MUST NOTE::::  Be more abstract, use more white bright colors. also uses other colors

prompts.title: Be More Colorful
prompts.description: MUST NOTE::::  Be more abstract, use more colorful bright colors. also uses other colors

prompts.title: Transparency: False
prompts.description: png_transparency: False (make sure the full canvas is drawn with colors)

prompts.title: Lock Aspect Ratio
prompts.description: MUST NOTE::::  LOCK ASPECT RATIO TO 2:3, do not crop or change framing.

prompts.title: MY PROMPT
prompts.description: Please teach me like I'm a beginner or a child. Give your explanation mostly in English, but use Bangla (বাংলা) to help me understand clearly. Mix both languages naturally so I can learn English terms while truly understanding the concepts in Bangla.
